response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds immense value to us at $8,000, but considering its importance to you, I believe it's only fair to present it to you at an exclusive introductory price. For this limited time, you can acquire the product for $7,200. It's a fantastic opportunity to own something truly exceptional at a special rate. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.", "product_price": 7200}
